line_1: No more they wanton drive before the Blasts,
line_2: But strike the Sails, and bring down all the Masts.

line_1: Retiring Autumn flings her howling blasts,
line_2: When o'er the cultured lawns and dreary wastes

line_1: Where rigid lasting Cold, and Northern Blasts
line_2: O'er whiten'd Lands a pearly Shining cast;
